doc:
Larry Drake https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Drake 0 Larry Richard Drake (February 21, 1950 – March 17, 2016) was an American actor, voice artist, and comedian best known as Benny Stulwicz in L.A. Law, Robert G. Durant in both Darkman and Darkman II: The Return of Durant and the voice of Pops in Johnny Bravo. Larry_Richard_Drake ( February_21_,_1950 – March_17_,_2016 ) was an_American_actor , voice_artist , and comedian best_known as Benny_Stulwicz in L.A._Law , Robert_G._Durant in both_Darkman_and_Darkman_II : The_Return of Durant and the_voice of Pops in Johnny_Bravo .
